title: Create and add PB Partner Hub logo asset

requirements.text: Generate a PB Partner Hub brand logo as a transparent PNG suitable for use in the website header/footer (square, clean at small sizes), and add it as a static asset under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` using the exact filename already referenced by the UI: `pb-partner-hub-logo-transparent.dim_200x200.png`.

quotes: PB Partner HUB ka logo please

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/public/assets/generated/pb-partner-hub-logo-transparent.dim_200x200.png` exists and is a 200x200 transparent PNG.
The existing Header and Footer logo renders without broken images and remains crisp at 40x40 display size.

requirements.text: Ensure the generated logo asset is served as a frontend static file (do not route the logo through the backend), and confirm it is used consistently anywhere the site logo appears (at minimum: Header and Footer).

quotes: PB Partner HUB ka logo please

acceptanceCriteria: No backend endpoints or blob storage are used to fetch the logo.
Header and Footer both load the logo from `/assets/generated/pb-partner-hub-logo-transparent.dim_200x200.png`.

constraints: Do not edit any files under `frontend/src/components/ui`.
Do not introduce any new backend canisters or external services.
nonGoals: Redesigning the site theme or changing existing page layouts.
Adding authentication, dashboards, or WhatsApp-related changes.

required: Square brand logo with the letters 'PB' and a clean, professional insurance/partner-hub feel, transparent background (pb-partner-hub-logo-transparent.dim_200x200.png)
